Name: Santa's Christmas Solitaire 2
About the game: Krampus has stolen Santa's sack of Christmas presents with help from his army of teddy bears! You must play solitaire to help Santa recover the Christmas presents and defeat Krampus to save Christmas this year. Buy items from the Christmas store and play minigames to help you on your adventure. You will encounter Krampus and his little friends along the way which you will need to defeat in snowball fights. Can you save Christmas in time? *** Features *** Sequel to our popular 'Santa's Christmas Solitaire' (released in 2016) Brand new story with full voice over 3 difficulty levels 3 game modes: - One Up, One Down - Pair Match - Sum of 14 Mini-games Snowball Fight card game! Hidden Object sections 36 store items 240 card levels
